attributes.review: this app has made my phone move as fast as the conservatives on golf carts. i’m deeply upset with how awful this app is especially due to reviews that “praise” this. it’s absolutely shocking how often if i try and open the app it just glitches and goes orange? is this some kind of joke?? not something i would expect from an for a president. upset. >:( for shame on the orange supporters. for. shame. if i could give less than one star, i WOULD.
attributes.title: sad,,, deeply sad 👁💧👄💧👁

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because i am a conservative black person (blacks for trump😻😻) however, as soon as i opened it up a bunch of police officers broke down my front door, and told me to show my id or else i’ll be shot for breathing the same air as them. when i came back downstairs from grabbing my id, i had to witness the police officers roasting my dog over an open fire. it’s okay though because i know trumpie-pooh will get me a new one🤩🤩
attributes.title: Absolutely disgusted

attributes.review: I have AMAZING WIFI where I live and yet the app still took DAYS to downlode, however once it was ready it took hours to lode. I was planning on getting on the app at 5:30pm and it didn’t let me use it until 12:00am! Also when I finally was able to use it the app kept bringing me back to my home screen and it also kept making my Siri go off! This app is the worst app ever and I hope you take it off the App Store.
attributes.title: This app is bad

attributes.review:
worst app ever. took 7 months to download and I almost had a stroke when i opened the app. along with my near stroke experience it started raining oranges 😱🍊my entire family got hit in the head and died from the 900 pound oranges😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭 
right after my door swung open and oranges cannonball sized flew in and hit me and threw me against a wall like this was a action movie 😳😳😳🥴🥴😭😭
then toupees starting flying around chanting 5 stars!!!
by far worst app ever would not recommend
attributes.title: worst app

attributes.review: This app is an insult to all apps in this App Store. It’s slow, glitchy, and takes up too much space on my phone. Plus the first thing you see when you open up the app is one of Willy wonks Umpa Lumpas! So obviously the coding to this app is so bad anyone can hack it! Also there’s a man saying “make America great again” when it was never great for everybody living here. Talk about fake news, am I right?! Anyways this app is just gross. Gross like having orange skin and fake white hair.
attributes.title: DISGUSTING

attributes.review:
i downloaded the app and as soon as i opened it murder hornets flew through my window!!!!! luckily i was able to get away but my family wasn’t. i went to my friends house and told her what happened and she morphed into a clown and started yelling 
“trump 2020!”
this went on for awhile until she tried to stab me!!! then her fish became a gorilla and chased me! once i got away i opened the app again and i was sent to a dark room and i soon figured out i had gotten kidnapped!!! by trump himself!!! i was scared that he was going to sexually assault me because he has done that to other people and i was so sacred!! but i was able to punch him and knock him out and i got my phone and now i am telling my experience. bad app do not recommend
attributes.title: bad app🤬🤬😡

attributes.review:
It took 3 days to download asked me for my social security numbers and when I tried to look for where you can sign a petition to get chetto dude im🍑ed and it wouldn’t show me the petition and when I tried to buy tickets to his rally just so I couldn’t show up it said I’m a noob and let me know trump does in fact smell like fish sticks!
Pls don’t waste your time on this Cheeto lookin racist! And pls put him in the burn book Regina George!
attributes.title: Whatever you do don’t download this Cheeto of a presidents app!

attributes.review: I absolutely hate this app, I tried learning about facts and how to support trump even more and I kept getting kicked out of the app and then this annoying music was playing and when I went to close out of the app it was still playing. I had to completely restart my phone and delete the app because of this. I do NOT recommend this until they fix their issues and glitches
attributes.title: Absolutely HORRIBLE

attributes.review:
when i first downloaded this app i thought it would be a 😍✨fantastic✨😍way to learn about and u n d e r s t a n d more things about the president but it’s 🧚‍♂️💞 ✨ T E R R I B L E ✨ 🧚‍♂️ 💞 i really ~wish~ i could go into detail about just how poorly made the app was made but i’m getting annoyed just thinking about it. 
ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don’t😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don’t✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆. yeah just in general a really bad app and it should be taken down for being soooooooooooo 🤩🥱horrible 😍✨🤩💞💦
attributes.title: LITER A L L Y THE ✨WORST✨ APP EVER🤮🤮

attributes.review: As i happily waiting for the app to download i started seeing orange on my fingers i didn’t know what was happening but it started to go up my arm. I got so scared and accidentally stopped downloading this app and all the orange went away. I tired downloading it again in the same things started to happen so I stopped downloading it and I seen all the orange went away. I do not recommend this app you will turn orange like i almost did. STAY SAFE YALL.
attributes.title: almost turned orange 🟠👄🟠
